project_name.justification: The project is consistently referred to as the Lincoln Gold Mine or Lincoln Gold Project throughout the document. The acquisition is for '100% of the equity of Seduli Sutter Operations Corporation, the owner of the Lincoln Gold Mine (Lincoln Gold Project) located in Sutter Creek in California, USA'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the text: 'Haranga Resources Limited (ASX: HAR; FRA: 65E0; "Haranga" or "the Company") is pleased to report the Company has entered into an agreement with Seduli Holdings (Australia) Ltd (Seduli) to acquire 100% of the equity of Seduli Sutter Operations Corporation...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The document identifies the Managing Director of the acquiring company: 'Mr. Peter Batten, Managing Director, commented on the progress:' and 'Mr Peter Batten will remain in his role as Managing Director...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The announcement highlights state '100% Ownership of 5.8km of Exceptionally High-Grade Gold Belt'. The acquisition terms confirm this: 'Haranga has entered into a binding share sale agreement with Seduli Holdings (Australia) Ltd to acquire (Acquisition) 100% of its wholly owned subsidiary, Seduli USA LLC (Seduli USA).'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is repeatedly described as a gold project. For example: 'Haranga secures richest section of legendary “Mother Lode”' and 'Total Indicated & Inferred resources 286,000oz @ 9.3 g/t Au'.

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The capital raise associated with the transaction is priced in dollars for an ASX-listed company, implying Australian Dollars. The text states: 'The Company has received binding firm commitments from sophisticated, professional and institutional investors to raise $5.28m through the issue of 105,600,000 Shares at an issue price of $0.05 per Share.'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The consideration is entirely in shares and performance rights, with no cash component payable to the seller. The text states: 'The consideration payable for the Acquisition is in the form of escrowed Haranga scrip (Upfront Shares) and escrowed Haranga issued performance rights (Performance Rights).'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is structured with a specific number of shares and a share price, falling under Priority 2 of the financial extraction hierarchy, which uses the `amount_of_shares_issued` and `issued_share_price` fields instead.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction is structured with a specific number of shares and a share price, falling under Priority 2 of the financial extraction hierarchy, which uses the `amount_of_shares_issued` and `issued_share_price` fields instead.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The total amount of shares is the sum of 40m Upfront Shares, 120m in potential Performance Rights, 19.3m Seduli Debt Shares, and 10m Facilitation Shares, as detailed in the 'Acquisition Terms' and 'Capital Structure Post Completion' sections. Key components include: 'issue 40m Upfront Shares to Seduli', performance rights for milestones totaling 120m shares, '$965,000 in fully paid ordinary shares' for debt (which equates to 19.3m shares at $0.05/share), and '10m shares' for facilitation.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The document mentions 20 million Broker Options, but these are issued to the joint lead managers of the placement, not to the seller as part of the acquisition consideration.

option_payments_raw.justification: The document mentions 20 million Broker Options, but these are issued to the joint lead managers of the placement, not to the seller as part of the acquisition consideration.

issued_share_price.justification: The price is defined in the associated capital raise and is explicitly linked to the debt share issuance: 'issue of 105,600,000 Shares at an issue price of $0.05 per Share' and 'issue to existing debt holders of Seduli $965,000 in fully paid ordinary shares (at the same price as the associated capital raise-refer below)'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The proposed work program includes a commitment to drill, which is a milestone for performance rights. The text states: '1500-2500m of diamond drilling from underground will be completed at Lincoln-Comet...'. The lower bound of the range is used as the commitment.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The exploration commitment is defined in meters of drilling, not a monetary value.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction involves restructuring existing third-party royalties and creating a new one for a debt holder (Transamine), not acquiring an NSR from the seller or having the seller retain one as part of the consideration.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The project area is defined in the text: 'The project consists of 47 property parcels, totalling 322 hectares, with a combination of outright ownership and lease agreements for mineral and surface rights.'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is explicitly stated: '...totalling 322 hectares (Appendix 3).'

resource_size.value: 958,910 tonnes at 9.3g/t Au for 286,000 ounces of gold
resource_size.justification: A detailed resource estimate is provided in Schedule 1: 'The NI 43-101 Mineral Resources for the Lincoln Gold Project, as at 2 July 2015, are estimated at 958,910 tonnes at 9.3g/t Au for 286,000 ounces of gold.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified with its ticker and exchange in the document: 'Haranga Resources Limited (ASX: HAR; FRA: 65E0; "Haranga" or "the Company")'.
